Name: Obey The Law
About the game: In this tactical shooter you lead a special police task force. Your missions include counter-terrorism, hostage rescue, and targeting organized crime. Use your voice to issue commands to your squad or to hostages. Order you team to clear rooms or provide cover for you. Choose from a wide variety of weapons like rifles, electric tasers, knives, sledge hammers, or grenades. Internet connection for Voice Recognition is required. The game is fully playable without Voice Recognition.
Meta Title: Obey The Law: Nov 2, 2020, Huszár András and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Obey The Law? Check out the release date (Nov 2, 2020), developer insights from Huszár András, and a complete game summary.
